formattedAddress: 174 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 174 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10026-1204, USA

originalText.text:
A 1000/10 Experience!!!
My hair had endured a semester of neglect, and I was apprehensive about its condition. However, the team at Honey Salon not only worked their magic with an incredible silk press but also demonstrated unmatched patience, care, and kindness. The stylist, a true hair magician, not only transformed my near-matted hair into a sleek masterpiece but also took the time to offer valuable advice on maintaining its health. The level of professionalism and genuine concern for the well-being of my hair set this salon apart.

I can't praise this salon enough for the outstanding service and the wonderful results. While I promise to take better care of my hair in the future, I also promise to become a loyal customer of Honey Salon! This is not just a salon; it's an oasis of expertise and care.

Thank you, Honey, for the exceptional experience! I look forward to many more visits.

originalText.text: I have trouble finding a beautician that can deal with my hair and my sensitive scalp. Over the years I’ve found it hard to get my hair to grow past bob/ neck length and maintain the fullness. I have been going to Lolita for years. But since December I have been very consistent with receiving a silk press, treatments , and making sure my ends are clipped. Lolita has made me feel comfortable enough to wear my natural hair out. My hair has grown tremendously since I’ve been consistent. I love how she doesn’t place a lot of heat to my hair and how she always recommend different services for my sensitive scalp. I couldn’t ask for a more patient and honest beautician. Thank you Honey Salon for your service. But thank you to Lolita in particular.

originalText.text: Honey hair salon is truly the place to be for natural hair girlies! I always feel welcomed and at home. All the hair stylists and receptionist are always friendly and professional. Helen, my go to stylist did an amazing job with my new hair transformation- hair color to light brown, trim, and silk press. Words cannot express how truly happy Helen made me feel about my hair transformation. She is definitely making my new decade-30s very different and exciting. I look forward to continue being a regular customer here at this lovely salon. You honestly get what you pay for when it comes to treating your hair so I highly recommend this establishment!

originalText.text: I absolutely adore the warm and inviting atmosphere of Honey Salon. During my first visit, Mist was assigned as my stylist, and I couldn't have been happier! Mist is exceptionally knowledgeable about natural hair care and genuinely cares about the health of your hair. She shared some valuable tips on maintaining my hair in between salon visits. My ponytail was styled to perfection. Even after almost a week, it still looks amazing! Thank you so much, Mist!

text.text: I absolutely adore the warm and inviting atmosphere of Honey Salon. During my first visit, Mist was assigned as my stylist, and I couldn't have been happier! Mist is exceptionally knowledgeable about natural hair care and genuinely cares about the health of your hair. She shared some valuable tips on maintaining my hair in between salon visits. My ponytail was styled to perfection. Even after almost a week, it still looks amazing! Thank you so much, Mist!

originalText.text: I’ve been coming to Honey Salon for over 9 years now and I am never disappointed. I’m always greeted with a smile, someone is always there to take my coat and I am immediately escorted to my stylist who is always on time! My stylist Shawn is absolutely amazing. He listens, he’s patient, he’s knowledgeable and whatever style I want, he makes sure to execute perfectly. My hair has improved so much over the years by listening to my stylist about ways to take care of it.
